item.description: a weapons store in [[Deastok]] (also has some magical items and potions but focuses on weapons and armor) owned by [] Previous Experiences we bought some weapons and armor before facing the [[Aboleth]] we were offered a shady deal to get the [[Elixir of Health]] for [[The Bean Bois/Tia|Tia]]
